summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of McClellan Street, from 12th Avenue South to 13th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 174281, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
